data.name: Bankster
data.detailed_description:
Risk it all, or play it safe? The choice is yours in Bankster.
Expect a world of back-room negotiations, criminal enterprise, and an in depth financial system.

There will be Tough Moral Choices, Secret Societies, Alien Technology, and even Interplanetary Councils, as you rise through the ranks to build your Wealth & Power.

Establish your first Bank. Expand your territory. Take over your opponents. Become a Federal Reserve. Even make your own currency. Then, use it against enemy nations. Soon you'll control the planet. Its all just a starting platform for your negotiations towards the colonization of other worlds. Only you can plot your path in this financial conflict. Your wealth will buy you VICTORY!

Banksters awaits.

Key Features:

+ Fully Procedural Terrain.
+ Immersive Soundtrack
+ Vehicles (Yacht, Sports Car, Helicopter)
+ Contracts. (Invest in businesses within your empire, then trade or sell their contracts as you progress.)
data.about_the_game:
Risk it all, or play it safe? The choice is yours in Bankster.
Expect a world of back-room negotiations, criminal enterprise, and an in depth financial system.

There will be Tough Moral Choices, Secret Societies, Alien Technology, and even Interplanetary Councils, as you rise through the ranks to build your Wealth & Power.

Establish your first Bank. Expand your territory. Take over your opponents. Become a Federal Reserve. Even make your own currency. Then, use it against enemy nations. Soon you'll control the planet. Its all just a starting platform for your negotiations towards the colonization of other worlds. Only you can plot your path in this financial conflict. Your wealth will buy you VICTORY!

Banksters awaits.

Key Features:

+ Fully Procedural Terrain.
+ Immersive Soundtrack
+ Vehicles (Yacht, Sports Car, Helicopter)
+ Contracts. (Invest in businesses within your empire, then trade or sell their contracts as you progress.)
data.short_description: Establish your first bank. Expand your territory, as you take over your opponents. Become a Federal Reserve. Even make your own currency. Then, use it against enemy nations. Soon you may control the planet, maybe even the galaxy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 (64 bit only), Windows 8 (64 bit only), Windows 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: X64 Dual Core CPU, 2+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete Non Mobile GPU with 1 GB Ram
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required for online multiplayer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 (64 bit only), Windows 8 (64 bit only), Windows 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: X64 Quad Core CPU, 3+ GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete Non Mobile GPU with 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.0
  • Processor: X64 Dual Core CPU, 2+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600 (Graphic Drivers: nVidia 310, AMD 12.11), OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required for online multiplayer
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.0

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete Non Mobile GPU with 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
